dvd.name: The Goonies
dvd.author: Richard Donner
dvd.preview: Front Cover: A bunch of scared-looking kids crowded around a Pirate skull and gold coins!
Inside Cover: 'Don't say that, ever say that. Goonies never say die.'
Back Cover: A deliciously dizzy adventure with crowd-pleasing fun!

dvd.name: The Lost Boys
dvd.author: Joel Schumacher
dvd.preview: Front Cover: A group of tough-looking young-adults staring you menacingly in the eyes.
Inside Cover: 'You'll never grow old Michael, and you'll never die. But you must feed!'
Back Cover: A hip, comic twist on classic vampire stories

dvd.name: Stand By Me
dvd.author: Rob Reiner
dvd.preview: Front Cover: Four young boys painted above a backdrop of open wilderness
Inside Cover: 'I never had any friends later on like the ones I had when I was twelve...'
Back Cover: Absolutely wonderful...a film I may never forget!

dvd.name: Attack On Titan: Season 3
dvd.author: Masashi Koizuka
dvd.preview: Front Cover: Two people stand at the foot of a massive crystal-laden cavern; a third person is chained to the walls above them.
Inside Cover: 'This world is merciless, and it's also very beautiful.'
Back Cover: Lies uphold these walls.

book.name: Hitchiker's Guide To The Galaxy
book.author: Douglas Adams
book.preview: Front Cover: A large hand with thumb pointed out in outer space. A comical green entity smiles in the background.
Inside Cover: 'Forty-two, said Deep Thought, with infinite majesty and calm.'
Back Cover: Extremely funny...inspired lunacy..[and] over much too soon.

book.name: The Shining
book.author: Stephen King
book.preview: Front Cover: A crazed looking man is scowling through the hole in a partially destroyed door.
Inside Cover: 'All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy'.
Back Cover: Scary!...Serves up horrors at a brist, unflagging pace.

book.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
book.author: Daniel Radcliffe
book.preview: Front Cover: A young boy on a broomstick flies through stone pillars near a forest at nightfall.
Inside Cover: 'The truth.' Dumbledore sighed. 'It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.'
Back Cover: Harry Potter could assume the same near-legendary status as\n Roald Dahl's Charlie, of chocolate factory fame.

book.name: Dilla Time
book.author: Dan Charnas
book.preview: Front Cover: A pixelated portrait of a young man in a ball cap, set in front of a blue and black grid of squares.
Inside Cover: 'I look at J Dilla as a man who redefined the word innovative. - DJ PREMIER'
Back Cover: This book is a must for everyone interested in illuinating the idea of unexplainable genius.

book.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
book.author: Harper Lee
book.preview: Front Cover: A black and green silouette of a large tree, set on a blood-red backdrop.
Inside Cover: 'The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience'.
Back Cover: That rare literary phenomenon, a Southern novel with no mildew on its magnolia leaves.

book.name: The Great Gatsby
book.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
book.preview: Front Cover: A woman's face sheds a tear, and blends in to the night sky. A bright city scene illuminates itself below.
Inside Cover: 'I love her and that's the beginning and end of everything.'
Back Cover: It is a magical, living book, blended of irony, romance, and mysticism.

book.name: Frankenstein
book.author: Mary Shelley
book.preview: Front Cover: An isolated castle sits below a pitch black sky filled with lightning.
Inside Cover: 'Beware, for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.'
Back Cover: You are my creator, but I am your master - obey!

book.name: Flowers for Algernon
book.author: Daniel Keyes
book.preview: Front Cover: A black inkblot, dotted with blue and yellow flowers, sits in the middle of a white background.
Inside Cover: 'There are so many doors to open. I am impatient to begin.'
Back Cover: An insightful first-person account of the difficulties and joys of the writing life and...\none of the most useful writers' manuals to be published in a long time.

book.name: Twilight
book.author: Stephenie Meyer
book.preview: Front Cover: A lightly colored, pair of delicate looking hands hold a bright red apple on top of a deep black backdrop.
Inside Cover: 'What if I'm not the hero? What if I'm the bad guy?'
Back Cover: An Amazon 'Best Book of the Decade...So Far'.

book.name: The Hunger Games
book.author: Suzanne Collins
book.preview: Front Cover: A golden emblem of a bird holding an arrow is centered among a maze of concentrenic circles.
Inside Cover: 'Hope is the only thing stronger than fear.'
Back Cover: A violent, jarring, speed-rap of a novel that generates nearly constant suspense.

book.name: James and the Giant Peach
book.author: Roald Dahl
book.preview: Front Cover: A silouette of a young boy standing with giant insects appear to be dancing.
Inside Cover: 'There are a whole lot of things in this world of ours you haven't started wondering about yet.'
Back Cover: Poor James is miserable until something peculiar happens and James finds himself on the most wonderful and extraordinary \n journey he could ever imagine.

book.name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
book.author: Roald Dahl
book.preview: Front Cover: A small boy is smiling wildy, holding a golden ticket. He is standing next to an eccentric looking man wearing a top hat.
Inside Cover: 'The greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places.'
Back Cover: Charlie Bucket, Our Hero, a boy who is honest and kind, brave, and true, and good and ready for the wildes time of his life!

book.name: The Graveyard Book
book.author: Neil Gaiman
book.preview: Front Cover: A rumpled metal silouette is kneeling and facing off into the darkness.
Inside Cover: 'If you dare nothing, then when the day is over, nothing is all you will have gained.'
Back Cover: Like a bite of dark Halloween chocolate, this novel proves rich, bittersweet, and very satisfying.

book.name: Coraline
book.author: Neil Gaiman
book.preview: Front Cover: A young girl with distorted eyes stares past the viewer. She is holding a golden candle, and set on a blotchy black background.
Inside Cover: 'She's got this whole world where everything's better. The food, the garden, the neighbors. But it's all a trap.
Back Cover: Coraline will have to fight with all her wits and courage if she is to save herself and return to her ordinary life.
